TASK: Craft an item of type: mojang_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 12}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 16}, {"type": "cat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 18}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 37, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 31, "index": 32}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a mojang_banner_pattern, I need to place an enchanted_golden_apple on top of a piece of paper in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the enchanted_golden_apple from slot 30 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mojang_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 12}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 16}, {"type": "cat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 18}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 37, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 31, "index": 32}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: I have already placed the enchanted_golden_apple in the crafting grid, so now I need to place the paper to the right of it. Therefore, I will move the paper from slot 42 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mojang_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 12}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 16}, {"type": "cat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 18}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 37, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 31, "index": 32}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the mojang_banner_pattern, I need to move it from the crafting grid to my inventory. Therefore, I will move the mojang_banner_pattern from slot 0 to slot 11.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
